channel.title: New to Linux? Want to try?
channel.description:
Hi, are you new to Linux? And want to try it? OpenSUSE is an easy to use Linux version. Download and more information: http://en.opensuse.org/Released_Version#Downloads
Give it a try. Any questions about Linux please post.

item.title: New to Linux? Want to try?
